title: GIC is said to weigh selling $5 billion stake in Indiaâ€™s Greenko
description: Singaporean sovereign wealth fund GIC Pte is exploring options for its 50% stake in Greenko Energy Holdings. The stake could be valued at around $5 billion. Potential investors include infrastructure funds, sovereign wealth funds, and other energy entities. Greenko may also raise funds soon to support its growth initiatives.
